global.description: This website is unofficial website of AniMare made by fans. This website is intended to introduce members of AniMare.
global.disclaimer:
This website is offered by Yamagishi Kazutoshi which is unlated with AniMare.
Please do not inquiries about this website to people or organizations other than Yamagishi Kazutoshi.
global.title: AniMare Unofficial Website

about_animare.text: AniMare is a coffee shop somewhere in Akabane. You can enjoy delicious coffee while playing games and chatting under the hospitality of girls like familiar animals. At first sight it looks like cosplay cafe, but actually...
about_animare.title: About AniMare
